DOC.brief_summary: sudden sensorineural hearing loss: - idiopathic in most cases - 5-20/100,000 new cases annually in the U.S - no establishes pathogenesis - treated with oral steroids in most cases - ~50% improvement in hearing levels - bed rest - acceptable treatment, not well investigated
DOC.brief_title: Bed Rest for Idiopathic Sudden Sensorineural Hearing Loss
DOC.criteria: patients with sudden sensorineural hearing loss age less than 16 years contraindication for oral steroid treatment prior steroid treatment for hearing loss pregnent women
DOC.keyword: Bed rest for idiopathic sudden sensorineural hearing loss
